verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said ( Duties of Priests and Levites) יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh So the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron, אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> ’at·tāh “ You וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> ū·ḇā·ne·ḵā and your sons וּבֵית־ <WH1004> ū·ḇêṯ- house אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> ’ā·ḇî·ḵā and your father’s אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> ’it·tāḵ ... תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> tiś·’ū must bear אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֲוֺ֣ן <WH5771> ‘ă·wōn the iniquity [involving] הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> ham·miq·dāš the sanctuary. וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> wə·’at·tāh And you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> ū·ḇā·ne·ḵā and your sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> ’it·tāḵ [alone] תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> tiś·’ū must bear אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֲוֺ֥ן <WH5771> ‘ă·wōn the iniquity [involving] כְּהֻנַּתְכֶֽם׃ <WH3550> kə·hun·naṯ·ḵem your priesthood.

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> wə·ḡam also אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- אַחֶיךָ֩ <WH251> ’a·ḥe·ḵā your brothers מַטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> maṭ·ṭêh from the tribe לֵוִ֜י <WH3878> lê·wî of Levi, שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> šê·ḇeṭ the tribe אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> ’ā·ḇî·ḵā of your father, הַקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> haq·rêḇ But bring אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> ’it·tāḵ with you וְיִלָּו֥וּ <WH3867> wə·yil·lā·wū that they may join עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·ḵā you וִֽישָׁרְת֑וּךָ <WH8334> wî·šā·rə·ṯū·ḵā and assist וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> wə·’at·tāh you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> ū·ḇā·ne·ḵā and your sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> ’it·tāḵ ... לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> ’ō·hel the Tent הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> hā·‘ê·ḏuṯ of the Testimony.

וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> wə·šā·mə·rū And they shall attend מִֽשְׁמַרְתְּךָ֔ <WH4931> miš·mar·tə·ḵā to your duties וּמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> ū·miš·me·reṯ and to all the duties כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- ... הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> hā·’ō·hel of the Tent; אַךְ֩ <WH389> ’aḵ ... אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- but כְּלֵ֨י <WH3627> kə·lê to the furnishings הַקֹּ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> haq·qō·ḏeš of the sanctuary וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- or הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> ham·miz·bê·aḥ the altar, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō they must not יִקְרָ֔בוּ <WH7126> yiq·rā·ḇū come near וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- or יָמֻ֥תוּ <WH4191> yā·mu·ṯū will die. גַם־ <WH1571> ḡam- both הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hêm they גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- and אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> ’at·tem you

וְנִלְו֣וּ <WH3867> wə·nil·wū They are to join עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·ḵā you וְשָֽׁמְר֗וּ <WH8104> wə·šā·mə·rū and attend אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH4931> miš·me·reṯ to the duties אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> ’ō·hel of the Tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> mō·w·‘êḏ of Meeting, לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> lə·ḵōl doing all עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏaṯ the work הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> hā·’ō·hel at the Tent; וְזָ֖ר <WH2114> wə·zār outsider לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- but no יִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> yiq·raḇ may come near אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> ’ă·lê·ḵem you.

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH8104> ū·šə·mar·tem And you shall attend אֵ֚ת <WH853> ’êṯ מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> miš·me·reṯ to the duties הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> haq·qō·ḏeš of the sanctuary וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> wə·’êṯ [and] מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> miš·me·reṯ הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham·miz·bê·aḥ of the altar, וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- may not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih·yeh fall ע֛וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ again. קֶ֖צֶף <WH7110> qe·ṣep̄ so that wrath עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ...

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> wa·’ă·nî I Myself הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin·nêh Behold, לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH3947> lā·qaḥ·tî have selected אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <WH251> ’ă·ḥê·ḵem your fellow הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> hal·wî·yim Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> mit·tō·wḵ from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... לָכֶ֞ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) to you, מַתָּנָ֤ה 4979 N-fs ( mat·tā·nāh) as a gift נְתֻנִים֙ 5414 V-Qal-QalPassPrtcpl-mp ( nə·ṯu·nîm) dedicated לַֽיהוָ֔ה 3068 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) to the LORD לַעֲבֹ֕ד 5647 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( la·‘ă·ḇōḏ) to perform אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) עֲבֹדַ֖ת 5656 N-fsc ( ‘ă·ḇō·ḏaṯ) the service אֹ֥הֶל 168 N-msc ( ’ō·hel) for the Tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ 4150 N-ms ( mō·w·‘êḏ) of Meeting.

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> wə·’at·tāh But only you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> ū·ḇā·ne·ḵā and your sons אִ֠תְּךָ <WH854> ’it·tə·ḵā ... תִּשְׁמְר֨וּ <WH8104> tiš·mə·rū shall attend אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֜ם <WH3550> kə·hun·naṯ·ḵem to your priesthood לְכָל־ <WH3605> lə·ḵāl for everything דְּבַ֧ר <WH1697> də·ḇar concerning הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <WH4196> ham·miz·bê·aḥ the altar וּלְמִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> ū·lə·mib·bêṯ and what is inside לַפָּרֹ֖כֶת <WH6532> lap·pā·rō·ḵeṯ the veil, וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֑ם <WH5647> wa·‘ă·ḇaḏ·tem and you are to perform that service. עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏaṯ you the work מַתָּנָ֗ה <WH4979> mat·tā·nāh as a gift, אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> ’et·tên I am giving אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֔ם <WH3550> kə·hun·naṯ·ḵem of the priesthood וְהַזָּ֥ר <WH2114> wə·haz·zār but any outsider הַקָּרֵ֖ב <WH7131> haq·qā·rêḇ who comes near [the sanctuary] יוּמָֽת׃ס <WH4191> yū·māṯ must be put to death. ”

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( Offerings for Priests and Levites) יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron, וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> wa·’ă·nî I הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin·nêh “ Behold, נָתַ֣תִּֽי <WH5414> nā·ṯat·tî have put לְךָ֔ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) you אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת 4931 N-fsc ( miš·me·reṯ) in charge תְּרוּמֹתָ֑י 8641 N-fpc│1cs ( tə·rū·mō·ṯāy) of My offerings. לְכָל־ 3605 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḵāl) As for all קָדְשֵׁ֣י 6944 N-mpc ( qā·ḏə·šê) the sacred offerings בְנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( ḇə·nê-) vvv יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of the Israelites, לְךָ֨ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to you נְתַתִּ֧ים 5414 V-Qal-Perf-1cs│3mp ( nə·ṯat·tîm) I have given them לְמָשְׁחָ֛ה 4888 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·mā·šə·ḥāh) as a portion וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ 1121 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( ū·lə·ḇā·ne·ḵā) and your sons לְחָק־ 2706 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḥāq-) statute. עוֹלָֽם׃ 5769 N-ms ( ‘ō·w·lām) and a permanent

זֶֽה־ <WH2088> zeh- - יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih·yeh will be לְךָ֛ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) yours. מִקֹּ֥דֶשׁ 6944 Prep-m│N-msc ( miq·qō·ḏeš) the most holy offerings הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים 6944 Art│N-mp ( haq·qo·ḏā·šîm) ... מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) A portion of הָאֵ֑שׁ 784 Art│N-cs ( hā·’êš) [reserved] from the fire כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) From all קָ֠רְבָּנָם 7133 N-msc│3mp ( qā·rə·bā·nām) the offerings לְֽכָל־ 3605 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḵāl) ... מִנְחָתָ֞ם 4503 N-fsc│3mp ( min·ḥā·ṯām) whether grain offerings וּלְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc ( ū·lə·ḵāl-) ... חַטָּאתָ֗ם 2403 N-fsc│3mp ( ḥaṭ·ṭā·ṯām) or sin offerings וּלְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc ( ū·lə·ḵāl-) ... אֲשָׁמָם֙ 817 N-msc│3mp ( ’ă·šā·mām) or guilt offerings, אֲשֶׁ֣ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - יָשִׁ֣יבוּ 7725 V-Hifil-Imperf-3mp ( yā·šî·ḇū) they render לִ֔י Prep│1cs ( lî) to Me קֹ֣דֶשׁ 6944 N-msc ( qō·ḏeš) as most holy [offerings] קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים 6944 N-mp ( qā·ḏā·šîm) ..., לְךָ֛ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to you ה֖וּא 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) [that part] belongs וּלְבָנֶֽיךָ׃ 1121 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( ū·lə·ḇā·ne·ḵā) and your sons.

בְּקֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> bə·qō·ḏeš as a most holy [offering] הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> haq·qo·ḏā·šîm ..., ( Or You are to eat it in a most holy place) תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> tō·ḵă·len·nū You are to eat it כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- [and] every זָכָר֙ <WH2145> zā·ḵār male יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> yō·ḵal may eat אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw it. קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš as holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih·yeh- You shall regard it לָּֽךְ׃ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) -.

וְזֶה־ <WH2088> wə·zeh- And this לְּךָ֞ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) is yours as well: תְּרוּמַ֣ת 8641 N-fsc ( tə·rū·maṯ) the offering מַתָּנָ֗ם 4976 N-msc│3mp ( mat·tā·nām) of their gifts, לְכָל־ 3605 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḵāl) along with all תְּנוּפֹת֮ 8573 N-fpc ( tə·nū·p̄ōṯ) the wave offerings בְּנֵ֣י 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê) vvv יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of the Israelites. לְךָ֣ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to you נְתַתִּ֗ים 5414 V-Qal-Perf-1cs│3mp ( nə·ṯat·tîm) I have given this וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ 1121 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( ū·lə·ḇā·ne·ḵā) and your sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ 1323 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-fpc│2ms ( wə·liḇ·nō·ṯe·ḵā) and daughters אִתְּךָ֖ 854 Prep│2ms ( ’it·tə·ḵā) ... לְחָק־ 2706 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḥāq-) statute. עוֹלָ֑ם 5769 N-ms ( ‘ō·w·lām) as a permanent כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) Every טָה֥וֹר 2889 Adj-ms ( ṭā·hō·wr) ceremonially clean person בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ 1004 Prep-b│N-msc│2ms ( bə·ḇê·ṯə·ḵā) in your household יֹאכַ֥ל 398 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yō·ḵal) may eat it אֹתֽוֹ׃ 853 DirObjM│3ms ( ’ō·ṯōw) -.

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kōl all חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> ḥê·leḇ the freshest יִצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> yiṣ·hār olive oil וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and all חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> ḥê·leḇ the finest תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> tî·rō·wōš new wine וְדָגָ֑ן <WH1715> wə·ḏā·ḡān and grain רֵאשִׁיתָ֛ם <WH7225> rê·šî·ṯām as their firstfruits. אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that יִתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> yit·tə·nū I give you לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD לְךָ֥ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) נְתַתִּֽים׃ 5414 V-Qal-Perf-1cs│3mp ( nə·ṯat·tîm) the Israelites give
